name: SaveTheTree
description:
This is my submission for Unity's Create with Code 2 Game Jam. The theme of the jam was one rule, i made a platformer; the only rule is don't let the tree die . Hope you guys have fun.

Most of the environment tiles and the worm are from https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-line-platformer and https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-line-platformer
